National Health Commission Update on May 29, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, May 28, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 82 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 28 imported cases (Fujian Province 15 cases; Sichuan Province 6 cases; Shanghai Municipality 3 cases; Guangdong Province 1 case; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case; Heilongjiang Province 1 case; and Jiangsu Province 1 case, including 6 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Fujian Province 3 cases; Sichuan Province 2 cases; and Guangdong Province 1 case), 54 domestic cases (Shanghai Municipality 29 cases; Beijing Municipality 14 cases; Tianjin Municipality 7 cases; Henan Province 2 cases; Hubei Province 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case, including 21 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Shanghai Municipality 18 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; and Sichuan Province 1 case), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 252 patients have recovered and been discharged, 12,939 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 22.

Imported cases consist of 229 current cases (0 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases. An aggregated 18,637 confirmed cases, 18,408 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, May 28, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 2,929 confirmed cases (140 severe cases), an accumulated total of 215,860 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 5,226 total deaths, 224,015 total confirmed cases, and 3 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 4,073,242 individuals, and 192,254 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 211 new asymptomatic infected persons (50 imported cases and 161 domestic cases: Shanghai Municipality 93 cases; Hebei Province 13 cases; Jilin Province 10 cases; Liaoning Province 8 cases; Beijing Municipality 7 cases; Henan Province 7 cases; Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region 7 cases; Sichuan Province 4 cases; Tianjin Municipality 4 cases; Jiangsu Province 3 cases; Shandong Province 2 cases; Zhejiang Province 2 cases; and Anhui Province 1 case) were reported, 27 have been changed into confirmed cases (6 imported cases), 1,555 have been released from medical observation (41 imported cases), and 16,181 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (449 imported cases).

The NHC has received 2,148,037 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (332,251 total, 62,163 patients have been discharged, and 9,376 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (83 total and 82 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (1,815,703 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 1,911 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202205/ac66476324994b17806441c858574a80.shtml

National Health Commission Update on May 19, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, May 18, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 212 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 21 imported cases (Fujian Province 7 cases; Sichuan Province 7 cases; Guangdong Province 2 cases; Yunnan Province 2 cases; Shanghai Municipality 1 case; Tianjin Municipality 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case, including 4 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Sichuan Province 2 cases; Guangdong Province 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case), 191 domestic cases (Shanghai Municipality 82 cases; Beijing Municipality 50 cases; Sichuan Province 34 cases; Henan Province 11 cases; Tianjin Municipality 7 cases; Jilin Province 6 cases; and Guangdong Province 1 case, including 57 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Shanghai Municipality 48 cases; Tianjin Municipality 4 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; Jilin Province 2 cases; and Sichuan Province 1 case), 1 new death (1 domestic case: Shanghai Municipality 1 case), and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 394 patients have recovered and been discharged, 34,931 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 15.

Imported cases consist of 183 current cases (0 severe cases) and 0 suspected cases. An aggregated 18,444 confirmed cases, 18,261 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, May 18, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 5,022 confirmed cases (286 severe cases), an accumulated total of 212,342 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 5,218 total deaths, 222,582 total confirmed cases, and 0 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 3,947,706 individuals, and 293,427 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 870 new asymptomatic infected persons (45 imported cases and 825 domestic cases: Shanghai Municipality 637 cases; Sichuan Province 115 cases; Tianjin Municipality 26 cases; Jilin Province 15 cases; Anhui Province 12 cases; Henan Province 9 cases; Beijing Municipality 5 cases; Liaoning Province 3 cases; Jiangsu Province 2 cases; and Guangdong Province 1 case) were reported, 61 have been changed into confirmed cases (4 imported cases), 3,008 have been released from medical observation (63 imported cases), and 45,519 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (419 imported cases).

The NHC has received 1,313,017 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (331,794 total, 61,490 patients have been discharged, and 9,365 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (82 total and 82 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (981,141 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 1,176 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202205/0fea5bcdf81c461a84034fb25d8c4cc1.shtml

National Health Commission Update on May 18, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, May 17, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 391 patients have recovered and been discharged, 29,016 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 42.

Imported cases consist of 178 current cases (0 severe cases) and 0 suspected cases. An aggregated 18,423 confirmed cases, 18,245 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, May 17, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 5,205 confirmed cases (301 severe cases), an accumulated total of 211,948 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 5,217 total deaths, 222,370 total confirmed cases, and 0 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 3,932,700 individuals, and 313,372 are still under medical isolation.

The NHC has received 1,227,865 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (331,724 total, 61,380 patients have been discharged, and 9,361 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (82 total and 82 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (896,059 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 1,135 deaths).

National Health Commission Update on May 09, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, May 08, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 3,692,144 individuals, and 401,851 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 3,918 new asymptomatic infected persons (59 imported cases and 3,859 domestic cases: Shanghai Municipality 3,625 cases; Jiangsu Province 62 cases; Liaoning Province 50 cases; Henan Province 46 cases; Qinghai Province 18 cases; Beijing Municipality 16 cases; Zhejiang Province 16 cases; Guangdong Province 12 cases; Jiangxi Province 10 cases; Jilin Province 3 cases; and Hebei Province 1 case) were reported, 238 have been changed into confirmed cases (2 imported cases), 8,628 have been released from medical observation (88 imported cases), and 92,564 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (474 imported cases).

From 00:00 to 23:59, March 24, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 1,366 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 65 imported cases (Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 23 cases; Shanghai Municipality 12 cases; Guangdong Province 11 cases; Sichuan Province 6 cases; Beijing Municipality 5 cases; Shanxi Province 3 cases; Jilin Province 2 cases; Fujian Province 1 case; Jiangsu Province 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case, including 11 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Sichuan Province 5 cases; Guangdong Province 3 cases; Jilin Province 2 cases; and Zhejiang Province 1 case), 1,301 domestic cases (Jilin Province 1,110 cases; Shanghai Municipality 27 cases; Tianjin Municipality 25 cases; Hebei Province 24 cases; Heilongjiang Province 23 cases; Jiangxi Province 23 cases; Fujian Province 17 cases; Shandong Province 13 cases; Henan Province 10 cases; Liaoning Province 9 cases; Gansu Province 4 cases; Guangdong Province 4 cases; Shaanxi Province 3 cases; Yunnan Province 3 cases; Zhejiang Province 3 cases; Anhui Province 1 case; Guizhou Province 1 case; and Hunan Province 1 case), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 725 patients have recovered and been discharged, 21,923 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition remained the same with the previous day.

Imported cases consist of 1,182 current cases (1 severe case) and 13 suspected cases. An aggregated 17,161 confirmed cases, 15,977 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, March 24, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 26,892 confirmed cases (50 severe cases), an accumulated total of 109,119 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,638 total deaths, 140,651 total confirmed cases, and 16 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 2,152,648 individuals, and 371,757 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, March 08, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 4,208 confirmed cases (8 severe cases), an accumulated total of 103,013 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 111,857 total confirmed cases, and 22 remaining suspected cases. On this day, 399 new asymptomatic infected persons (77 imported cases and 322 domestic cases: Shandong Province 106 cases; Jilin Province 80 cases; Shanghai Municipality 62 cases; Yunnan Province 24 cases; Guangdong Province 20 cases; Heilongjiang Province 14 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 4 cases; Jiangsu Province 4 cases; Liaoning Province 2 cases; Shanxi Province 2 cases; Anhui Province 1 case; Chongqing Municipality 1 case; Gansu Province 1 case; and Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region 1 case) were reported, 26 have been changed into confirmed cases (13 imported cases), 31 have been released from medical observation (27 imported cases), and 2,749 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (1,252 imported cases).

The NHC has received 247,882 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (226,878 total, 23,679 patients have been discharged, and 2,578 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (82 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (20,922 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 853 deaths).

Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,625,299 individuals, and 69,826 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 100 new asymptomatic infected persons (78 imported cases and 22 domestic cases: Yunnan Province 12 cases; Guangdong Province 5 cases; Heilongjiang Province 3 cases; Shanghai Municipality 1 case; and Tianjin Municipality 1 case) were reported, 13 have been changed into confirmed cases (12 imported cases), 43 have been released from medical observation (42 imported cases), and 924 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (733 imported cases).

The NHC has received 64,839 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (44,386 total, 17,855 patients have been discharged, and 577 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (80 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (20,373 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 853 deaths).

National Health Commission Update on February 15, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, February 14, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 80 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 40 imported cases (Guangdong Province 16 cases; Fujian Province 8 cases; Shanghai Municipality 6 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 4 cases; Shandong Province 2 cases; Beijing Municipality 1 case; Heilongjiang Province 1 case; Jiangsu Province 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case, including 3 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 2 cases and Sichuan Province 1 case), 40 domestic cases (Liaoning Province 29 cases; Jiangsu Province 8 cases; Guangdong Province 2 cases; and Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case, including 1 case of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed case: Liaoning Province 1 case), no new deaths, and 2 new suspected cases (2 imported cases: Shanghai Municipality 2 cases).

On this day, 80 patients have recovered and been discharged, 5,746 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 701 current cases (1 severe case) and 3 suspected cases. An aggregated 13,088 confirmed cases, 12,387 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, February 14, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 1,398 confirmed cases (6 severe cases), an accumulated total of 101,060 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 107,094 total confirmed cases, and 3 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,561,451 individuals, and 30,116 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 44 new asymptomatic infected persons (37 imported cases and 7 domestic cases: Jiangsu Province 4 cases and Yunnan Province 3 cases) were reported, 4 have been changed into confirmed cases (3 imported cases), 50 have been released from medical observation (47 imported cases), and 791 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (714 imported cases).

The NHC has received 38,194 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (18,494 total, 14,763 patients have been discharged, and 221 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (19,621 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202202/443f12e829a04363be86febe826d195a.shtml

National Health Commission Update on February 14, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, February 13, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 84 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 58 imported cases (Guangdong Province 27 cases; Shandong Province 14 cases; Shanghai Municipality 8 cases; Fujian Province 5 cases; Liaoning Province 2 cases; Henan Province 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case, including 9 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 5 cases; Fujian Province 1 case; Henan Province 1 case; Liaoning Province 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case), 26 domestic cases (Liaoning Province 18 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 6 cases; Guangdong Province 1 case; and Yunnan Province 1 case), no new deaths, and 2 new suspected cases (2 imported cases: Shanghai Municipality 2 cases).

On this day, 83 patients have recovered and been discharged, 2,739 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition remained the same with the previous day.

Imported cases consist of 691 current cases (1 severe case) and 2 suspected cases. An aggregated 13,048 confirmed cases, 12,357 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, February 13, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 1,398 confirmed cases (5 severe cases), an accumulated total of 100,980 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 107,014 total confirmed cases, and 2 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,559,239 individuals, and 33,653 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 39 new asymptomatic infected persons (31 imported cases and 8 domestic cases: Yunnan Province 6 cases; Guangdong Province 1 case; and Heilongjiang Province 1 case) were reported, 9 have been changed into confirmed cases (9 imported cases), 33 have been released from medical observation (28 imported cases), and 801 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (727 imported cases).

The NHC has received 36,692 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (17,046 total, 14,183 patients have been discharged, and 219 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (19,567 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202202/dd446fe3781740c5be600d160e6d9ee0.shtml

National Health Commission Update on February 13, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, February 12, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 67 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 39 imported cases (Guangdong Province 19 cases; Shanghai Municipality 9 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 5 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; Fujian Province 1 case; Shandong Province 1 case; Sichuan Province 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case, including 5 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 3 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case), 28 domestic cases (Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 13 cases; Liaoning Province 11 cases; Yunnan Province 2 cases; Guangdong Province 1 case; and Tianjin Municipality 1 case, including 1 case of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed case: Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 106 patients have recovered and been discharged, 4,937 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 672 current cases (1 severe case) and 12,990 confirmed cases, 12,318 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, February 12, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 1,397 confirmed cases (5 severe cases), an accumulated total of 100,897 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 106,930 total confirmed cases, and 0 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,556,902 individuals, and 34,056 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 34 new asymptomatic infected persons (33 imported cases and 1 domestic case: Yunnan Province 1 case) were reported, 6 have been changed into confirmed cases (5 imported cases), 47 have been released from medical observation (36 imported cases), and 804 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (733 imported cases).

The NHC has received 36,313 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (16,719 total, 14,183 patients have been discharged, and 219 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (19,515 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

National Health Commission Update on February 12, 2022

On this day, 99 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 59 imported cases (Guangdong Province 24 cases; Fujian Province 14 cases; Shanghai Municipality 7 cases; Sichuan Province 5 cases; Shandong Province 3 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 2 cases; Liaoning Province 2 cases; Heilongjiang Province 1 case; and Tianjin Municipality 1 case, including 10 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 5 cases; Sichuan Province 4 cases; and Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case), 40 domestic cases (Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 30 cases and Liaoning Province 10 cases), no new deaths, and 1 new suspected case (1 imported case: Shanghai Municipality 1 case).

On this day, 87 patients have recovered and been discharged, 3,623 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 673 current cases (1 severe case) and 1 suspected case. An aggregated 12,951 confirmed cases, 12,278 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, February 11, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 1,436 confirmed cases (6 severe cases), an accumulated total of 100,791 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 106,863 total confirmed cases, and 1 remaining suspected case. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,555,374 individuals, and 37,471 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 41 new asymptomatic infected persons (41 imported cases) were reported, 10 have been changed into confirmed cases (10 imported cases), 40 have been released from medical observation (36 imported cases), and 823 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (741 imported cases).

The NHC has received 36,117 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (16,583 total, 14,037 patients have been discharged, and 216 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (19,455 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

On this day, 101 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 45 imported cases (Guangdong Province 15 cases; Shanghai Municipality 12 cases; Fujian Province 10 cases; Zhejiang Province 3 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 2 cases; Shandong Province 1 case; Tianjin Municipality 1 case; and Yunnan Province 1 case, including 10 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 6 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 2 cases; and Zhejiang Province 2 cases), 56 domestic cases (Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 33 cases; Liaoning Province 22 cases; and Guizhou Province 1 case), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 105 patients have recovered and been discharged, 3,290 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 636 current cases (1 severe case) and 12,892 confirmed cases, 12,256 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, February 10, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 1,424 confirmed cases (5 severe cases), an accumulated total of 100,704 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 106,764 total confirmed cases, and 0 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,552,962 individuals, and 38,682 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 66 new asymptomatic infected persons (61 imported cases and 5 domestic cases: Heilongjiang Province 2 cases; Liaoning Province 2 cases; and Jiangsu Province 1 case) were reported, 10 have been changed into confirmed cases (10 imported cases), 48 have been released from medical observation (44 imported cases), and 832 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (746 imported cases).

National Health Commission Update on February 02, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, February 01, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 63 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 27 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 18 cases; Guangdong Province 5 cases; Beijing Municipality 1 case; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case; Henan Province 1 case; and Jilin Province 1 case, including 2 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Beijing Municipality 1 case and Guangdong Province 1 case), 36 domestic cases (Zhejiang Province 15 cases; Tianjin Municipality 12 cases; Guangdong Province 6 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; and Hebei Province 1 case), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 145 patients have recovered and been discharged, 1,964 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 809 current cases (1 severe case) and 12,631 confirmed cases, 11,822 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, February 01, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 1,802 confirmed cases (9 severe cases), an accumulated total of 99,764 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 106,202 total confirmed cases, and 0 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,533,257 individuals, and 44,522 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 28 new asymptomatic infected persons (24 imported cases and 4 domestic cases: Guangdong Province 4 cases) were reported, 2 have been changed into confirmed cases (2 imported cases), 30 have been released from medical observation (27 imported cases), and 810 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (688 imported cases).

The NHC has received 32,758 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (13,829 total, 12,806 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (18,850 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202202/be4b2a0a70494c43863407ad17816f63.shtml

National Health Commission Update on February 01, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 31, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 66 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 39 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 18 cases; Guangdong Province 8 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 5 cases; Shandong Province 3 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; Tianjin Municipality 2 cases; and Henan Province 1 case, including 5 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 2 cases; Tianjin Municipality 2 cases; and Henan Province 1 case), 27 domestic cases (Zhejiang Province 13 cases; Tianjin Municipality 7 cases; Hebei Province 4 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; and Guangdong Province 1 case), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 119 patients have recovered and been discharged, 2,664 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition remained the same with the previous day.

Imported cases consist of 856 current cases (1 severe case) and 12,604 confirmed cases, 11,748 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 31, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 1,884 confirmed cases (10 severe cases), an accumulated total of 99,619 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 106,139 total confirmed cases, and 0 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,529,275 individuals, and 42,504 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 32 new asymptomatic infected persons (31 imported cases and 1 domestic case: Beijing Municipality 1 case) were reported, 5 have been changed into confirmed cases (5 imported cases), 25 have been released from medical observation (20 imported cases), and 814 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (693 imported cases).

The NHC has received 32,614 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (13,745 total, 12,780 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (18,790 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202202/a71c3008500e44a5a94a60bb1899fd8a.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 31, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 30, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 58 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 18 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 10 cases; Guangdong Province 7 cases; and Fujian Province 1 case, including 3 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 3 cases), 40 domestic cases (Zhejiang Province 24 cases; Tianjin Municipality 11 cases; Beijing Municipality 3 cases; Heilongjiang Province 1 case; and Henan Province 1 case, including 1 case of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed case: Henan Province 1 case), no new deaths, and 3 new suspected cases (3 imported cases: Shanghai Municipality 3 cases).

On this day, 147 patients have recovered and been discharged, 3,721 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition remained the same with the previous day.

Imported cases consist of 868 current cases (1 severe case) and 4 suspected cases. An aggregated 12,565 confirmed cases, 11,697 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 30, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 1,937 confirmed cases (10 severe cases), an accumulated total of 99,500 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 106,073 total confirmed cases, and 4 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,522,986 individuals, and 38,879 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 52 new asymptomatic infected persons (48 imported cases and 4 domestic cases: Heilongjiang Province 4 cases) were reported, 4 have been changed into confirmed cases (3 imported cases), 36 have been released from medical observation (36 imported cases), and 812 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (687 imported cases).

The NHC has received 32,493 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (13,679 total, 12,753 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (18,735 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/aa1d81f859e1429991e5d321695bee92.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 30, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 29, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 81 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 27 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 10 cases; Beijing Municipality 3 cases; Yunnan Province 3 cases; Zhejiang Province 3 cases; Guangdong Province 2 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 2 cases; Henan Province 2 cases; Fujian Province 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case, including 1 case of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed case: Guangdong Province 1 case), 54 domestic cases (Beijing Municipality 20 cases; Zhejiang Province 19 cases; Heilongjiang Province 8 cases; Tianjin Municipality 4 cases; Henan Province 2 cases; and Yunnan Province 1 case, including 3 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Beijing Municipality 2 cases and Henan Province 1 case), no new deaths, and 1 new suspected case (1 imported case: Shanghai Municipality 1 case).

On this day, 182 patients have recovered and been discharged, 4,997 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 2.

Imported cases consist of 916 current cases (1 severe case) and 1 suspected case. An aggregated 12,547 confirmed cases, 11,631 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 29, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 2,026 confirmed cases (10 severe cases), an accumulated total of 99,353 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 106,015 total confirmed cases, and 1 remaining suspected case. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,519,457 individuals, and 39,072 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 65 new asymptomatic infected persons (49 imported cases and 16 domestic cases: Heilongjiang Province 12 cases; Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp 2 cases; Henan Province 1 case; and Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region 1 case) were reported, 4 have been changed into confirmed cases (1 imported case), 38 have been released from medical observation (36 imported cases), and 800 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (678 imported cases).

The NHC has received 32,373 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (13,613 total, 12,730 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (18,681 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

National Health Commission Update on January 29, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 28, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 59 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 22 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 10 cases; Guangdong Province 6 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 2 cases; Chongqing Municipality 1 case; Jiangsu Province 1 case; Liaoning Province 1 case; and Tianjin Municipality 1 case, including 2 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 2 cases), 37 domestic cases (Zhejiang Province 18 cases; Beijing Municipality 5 cases; Tianjin Municipality 5 cases; Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region 3 cases; Heilongjiang Province 2 cases; Hebei Province 1 case; Henan Province 1 case; Shanxi Province 1 case; and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp 1 case), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 200 patients have recovered and been discharged, 5,252 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 958 current cases (1 severe case) and 1 suspected case. An aggregated 12,520 confirmed cases, 11,562 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 28, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 2,127 confirmed cases (8 severe cases), an accumulated total of 99,171 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 105,934 total confirmed cases, and 1 remaining suspected case. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,514,010 individuals, and 38,625 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 32 new asymptomatic infected persons (29 imported cases and 3 domestic cases: Henan Province 1 case; Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region 1 case; and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp 1 case) were reported, 2 have been changed into confirmed cases (2 imported cases), 61 have been released from medical observation (57 imported cases), and 777 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (666 imported cases).

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 27, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 64 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 25 imported cases (Guangdong Province 7 cases; Shanghai Municipality 7 cases; Yunnan Province 5 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; Shandong Province 2 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case, including 1 case of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed case: Guangdong Province 1 case), 39 domestic cases (Zhejiang Province 16 cases; Heilongjiang Province 9 cases; Beijing Municipality 8 cases; Tianjin Municipality 4 cases; Guizhou Province 1 case; and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp 1 case, including 2 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Beijing Municipality 2 cases), no new deaths, and 3 new suspected cases (3 imported cases: Shanghai Municipality 3 cases).

On this day, 157 patients have recovered and been discharged, 3,015 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 2.

Imported cases consist of 994 current cases (1 severe case) and 3 suspected cases. An aggregated 12,498 confirmed cases, 11,504 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 27, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 2,268 confirmed cases (9 severe cases), an accumulated total of 98,971 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 105,875 total confirmed cases, and 3 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,510,597 individuals, and 40,464 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 54 new asymptomatic infected persons (42 imported cases and 12 domestic cases: Heilongjiang Province 9 cases; Beijing Municipality 1 case; Hubei Province 1 case; and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp 1 case) were reported, 3 have been changed into confirmed cases (1 imported case), 27 have been released from medical observation (25 imported cases), and 808 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (696 imported cases).

National Health Commission Update on January 27, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 26, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 63 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 38 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 20 cases; Yunnan Province 5 cases; Zhejiang Province 4 cases; Guangdong Province 3 cases; Henan Province 2 cases; Beijing Municipality 1 case; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case; Jilin Province 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case, including 6 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Zhejiang Province 4 cases; Guangdong Province 1 case; and Yunnan Province 1 case), 25 domestic cases (Zhejiang Province 6 cases; Beijing Municipality 5 cases; Heilongjiang Province 5 cases; Hebei Province 4 cases; Henan Province 1 case; Shanghai Municipality 1 case; Tianjin Municipality 1 case; Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region 1 case; and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp 1 case, including 2 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Beijing Municipality 1 case and Heilongjiang Province 1 case), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 188 patients have recovered and been discharged, 3,785 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 1,031 current cases* (1 severe case) and 12,473 confirmed cases*, 11,442 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 26, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 2,361 confirmed cases* (7 severe cases), an accumulated total of 98,814 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 105,811 total confirmed cases*, and 0 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,506,684 individuals, and 39,566 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 55 new asymptomatic infected persons (38 imported cases and 17 domestic cases: Heilongjiang Province 11 cases; Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region 3 cases; Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp 2 cases; and Jiangxi Province 1 case) were reported, 8 have been changed into confirmed cases (6 imported cases), 41 have been released from medical observation (36 imported cases), and 784 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (680 imported cases).

The NHC has received 31,844 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (13,262 total, 12,655 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (18,503 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

*1 decreased case after verification

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/30632a4dbf7d4a479a7677cb835a7710.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 26, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 25, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 44 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 20 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 10 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 4 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; Tianjin Municipality 2 cases; Chongqing Municipality 1 case; and Henan Province 1 case, including 2 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case and Tianjin Municipality 1 case), 24 domestic cases (Beijing Municipality 14 cases; Heilongjiang Province 4 cases; Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region 2 cases; Guangdong Province 1 case; Hebei Province 1 case; Henan Province 1 case; and Liaoning Province 1 case), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 173 patients have recovered and been discharged, 3,395 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 1,049 current cases (0 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases. An aggregated 12,436 confirmed cases, 11,387 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 25, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 2,487 confirmed cases (8 severe cases), an accumulated total of 98,626 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 105,749 total confirmed cases, and 3 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,505,286 individuals, and 41,953 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 64 new asymptomatic infected persons (44 imported cases and 20 domestic cases: Heilongjiang Province 9 cases; Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region 6 cases; and Beijing Municipality 5 cases) were reported, 2 have been changed into confirmed cases (2 imported cases), 31 have been released from medical observation (29 imported cases), and 778 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (684 imported cases).

National Health Commission Update on January 25, 2022

On this day, 183 patients have recovered and been discharged, 4,057 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 2.

Imported cases consist of 1,078 current cases (0 severe cases) and 6 suspected cases. An aggregated 12,416 confirmed cases, 11,338 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, 223 patients have recovered and been discharged, 4,903 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 1,104 current cases (0 severe cases) and 7 suspected cases. An aggregated 12,389 confirmed cases, 11,285 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 23, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 2,754 confirmed cases (11 severe cases), an accumulated total of 98,270 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 105,660 total confirmed cases, and 7 remaining suspected cases. National Health Commission Update on January 21, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 20, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 73 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 50 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 28 cases; Guangdong Province 10 cases; Shandong Province 6 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; Fujian Province 2 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case; and Henan Province 1 case, including 2 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 1 case and Henan Province 1 case), 23 domestic cases (Tianjin Municipality 8 cases; Beijing Municipality 5 cases; Guangdong Province 4 cases; Henan Province 3 cases; and Shaanxi Province 3 cases), no new deaths, and 1 new suspected case (1 imported case: Shanghai Municipality 1 case).

On this day, 197 patients have recovered and been discharged, 5,215 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 4.

Imported cases consist of 1,212 current cases (0 severe cases) and 5 suspected cases. An aggregated 12,273 confirmed cases, 11,061 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 20, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 3,173 confirmed cases (12 severe cases), an accumulated total of 97,675 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 105,484 total confirmed cases, and 5 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,496,694 individuals, and 55,263 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 31 new asymptomatic infected persons (29 imported cases and 2 domestic cases: Yunnan Province 2 cases) were reported, 2 have been changed into confirmed cases (2 imported cases), 19 have been released from medical observation (17 imported cases), and 765 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (720 imported cases).

The NHC has received 31,027 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (12,907 total, 12,493 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 79 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (18,041 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 851 deaths).

National Health Commission Update on January 08, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 07, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 159 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 64 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 32 cases; Guangdong Province 7 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 6 cases; Tianjin Municipality 6 cases; Fujian Province 4 cases; Hunan Province 3 cases; Yunnan Province 3 cases; Henan Province 1 case; Liaoning Province 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case, including 7 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Hunan Province 3 cases; Fujian Province 1 case; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case; Henan Province 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case), 95 domestic cases (Shaanxi Province 46 cases; Henan Province 43 cases; Zhejiang Province 4 cases; and Guangdong Province 2 cases), no new deaths, and 1 new suspected case (1 imported case: Shanghai Municipality 1 case).

On this day, 151 patients have recovered and been discharged, 5,578 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 3.

Imported cases consist of 1004 current cases (3 severe cases) and 1 suspected case. An aggregated 11,555 confirmed cases, 10,551 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 07, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 3,367 confirmed cases (27 severe cases), an accumulated total of 95,451 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 103,454 total confirmed cases, and 1 remaining suspected case. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,446,939 individuals, and 39,276 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 52 new asymptomatic infected persons (46 imported cases and 6 domestic cases: Shanghai Municipality 5 cases and Henan Province 1 case) were reported, 7 have been changed into confirmed cases (7 imported cases), 16 have been released from medical observation (15 imported cases), and 661 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (628 imported cases).

The NHC has received 30,086 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (12,749 total, 12,235 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 77 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (17,258 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 850 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/89f728fb3a834f45883914ecee8c4bdb.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 07, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 06, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 174 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 58 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 24 cases; Guangdong Province 9 cases; Tianjin Municipality 9 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 4 cases; Henan Province 2 cases; Hunan Province 2 cases; Liaoning Province 2 cases; Beijing Municipality 1 case; Fujian Province 1 case; Hubei Province 1 case; Sichuan Province 1 case; Yunnan Province 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case, including 5 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Henan Province 2 cases; Guangdong Province 1 case; Sichuan Province 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case), 116 domestic cases (Shaanxi Province 57 cases; Henan Province 56 cases; and Zhejiang Province 3 cases, including 21 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Henan Province 20 cases and Zhejiang Province 1 case), no new deaths, and 6 new suspected cases (6 imported cases: Shanghai Municipality 6 cases).

On this day, 97 patients have recovered and been discharged, 2,580 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition remained the same with the previous day.

Imported cases consist of 978 current cases (3 severe cases) and 7 suspected cases. An aggregated 11,491 confirmed cases, 10,513 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 06, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 3,359 confirmed cases (30 severe cases), an accumulated total of 95,300 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 103,295 total confirmed cases, and 7 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,444,595 individuals, and 42,512 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 45 new asymptomatic infected persons (42 imported cases and 3 domestic cases: Shanghai Municipality 3 cases) were reported, 26 have been changed into confirmed cases (5 imported cases), 16 have been released from medical observation (16 imported cases), and 632 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (604 imported cases).

The NHC has received 30,009 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (12,732 total, 12,235 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 77 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (17,198 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 850 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/f06879dd76e2402bbc4e23024f3d065e.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 06, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 05, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 189 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 57 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 20 cases; Guangdong Province 10 cases; Zhejiang Province 7 cases; Fujian Province 6 cases; Tianjin Municipality 4 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 2 cases; Sichuan Province 2 cases; Yunnan Province 2 cases; Henan Province 1 case; Jiangsu Province 1 case; Jilin Province 1 case; and Shandong Province 1 case, including 6 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Zhejiang Province 3 cases; Sichuan Province 2 cases; and Henan Province 1 case), 132 domestic cases (Henan Province 64 cases; Shaanxi Province 63 cases; and Zhejiang Province 5 cases, including 30 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Henan Province 30 cases), no new deaths, and 2 new suspected cases (2 imported cases: Shanghai Municipality 2 cases).

On this day, 198 patients have recovered and been discharged, 3,889 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have decreased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 939 current cases (3 severe cases) and 2 suspected cases. An aggregated 11,433 confirmed cases, 10,494 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 05, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 3,282 confirmed cases (30 severe cases), an accumulated total of 95,203 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 103,121 total confirmed cases, and 2 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,441,120 individuals, and 41,619 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 45 new asymptomatic infected persons (35 imported cases and 10 domestic cases: Henan Province 9 cases and Zhejiang Province 1 case) were reported, 36 have been changed into confirmed cases (6 imported cases), 12 have been released from medical observation (11 imported cases), and 629 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (583 imported cases).

The NHC has received 29,942 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (12,708 total, 12,230 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 77 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (17,155 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 850 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/29420e5890a84705b6dd7fc260948f49.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 05, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 04, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 91 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 50 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 17 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 9 cases; Fujian Province 7 cases; Guangdong Province 7 cases; Tianjin Municipality 5 cases; Hubei Province 2 cases; Beijing Municipality 1 case; Shaanxi Province 1 case; and Shandong Province 1 case, including 3 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 2 cases and Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case), 41 domestic cases (Shaanxi Province 35 cases; Henan Province 4 cases; and Zhejiang Province 2 cases, including 2 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Henan Province 2 cases), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 56 patients have recovered and been discharged, 3,106 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 921 current cases (3 severe cases) and 1 suspected case. An aggregated 11,376 confirmed cases, 10,455 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 04, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 3,291 confirmed cases (31 severe cases), an accumulated total of 95,005 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 102,932 total confirmed cases, and 1 remaining suspected case. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,438,066 individuals, and 42,454 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 71 new asymptomatic infected persons (49 imported cases and 22 domestic cases: Henan Province 18 cases and Shanghai Municipality 4 cases) were reported, 5 have been changed into confirmed cases (3 imported cases), 22 have been released from medical observation (21 imported cases), and 632 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (565 imported cases).

The NHC has received 29,898 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (12,690 total, 12,228 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 77 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (17,129 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 850 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/ff2dfd354c984c5f98ae146c465e5a92.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 04, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 03, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 175 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 67 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 29 cases; Guangdong Province 13 cases; Fujian Province 9 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 4 cases; Sichuan Province 3 cases; Yunnan Province 3 cases; Henan Province 1 case; Hunan Province 1 case; Jiangsu Province 1 case; Shandong Province 1 case; Tianjin Municipality 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case, including 5 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 4 cases and Hunan Province 1 case), 108 domestic cases (Shaanxi Province 95 cases; Zhejiang Province 8 cases; and Henan Province 5 cases, including 4 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Henan Province 4 cases), no new deaths, and 3 new suspected cases (3 imported cases: Shanghai Municipality 3 cases).

On this day, 46 patients have recovered and been discharged, 3,788 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 8.

Imported cases consist of 893 current cases (3 severe cases) and 3 suspected cases. An aggregated 11,326 confirmed cases, 10,433 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 03, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 3,256 confirmed cases (30 severe cases), an accumulated total of 94,949 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 102,841 total confirmed cases, and 3 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,434,795 individuals, and 42,293 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 54 new asymptomatic infected persons (33 imported cases and 21 domestic cases: Henan Province 19 cases and Shanghai Municipality 2 cases) were reported, 9 have been changed into confirmed cases (5 imported cases), 19 have been released from medical observation (17 imported cases), and 588 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (540 imported cases).

The NHC has received 29,851 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (12,677 total, 12,219 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 77 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (17,095 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 850 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/781709be5eb94fa089f940ebf1b0590e.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 03, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 02, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 161 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 60 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 26 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 7 cases; Guangdong Province 6 cases; Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region 5 cases; Beijing Municipality 4 cases; Fujian Province 2 cases; Henan Province 2 cases; Tianjin Municipality 2 cases; Yunnan Province 2 cases; Shaanxi Province 1 case; Shandong Province 1 case; Sichuan Province 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case, including 7 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 3 cases; Guangdong Province 2 cases; Henan Province 1 case; and Sichuan Province 1 case), 101 domestic cases (Shaanxi Province 92 cases and Zhejiang Province 9 cases), no new deaths, and no new suspected cases.

On this day, 47 patients have recovered and been discharged, 4,027 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 6.

Imported cases consist of 850 current cases (3 severe cases) and 11,259 confirmed cases, 10,409 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 02, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 3,127 confirmed cases (22 severe cases), an accumulated total of 94,903 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 102,666 total confirmed cases, and 0 remaining suspected cases. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,431,026 individuals, and 42,313 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 35 new asymptomatic infected persons (31 imported cases and 4 domestic cases: Henan Province 3 cases and Shanghai Municipality 1 case) were reported, 7 have been changed into confirmed cases (7 imported cases), 16 have been released from medical observation (14 imported cases), and 562 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (529 imported cases).

The NHC has received 29,813 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (12,664 total, 12,214 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 77 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (17,070 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 850 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/eb3f2f61f17344749a5db92ea59171f2.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 02, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, January 01, 2022, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 191 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 60 imported cases (Shanghai Municipality 18 cases; Guangdong Province 10 cases; Fujian Province 9 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 8 cases; Tianjin Municipality 5 cases; Sichuan Province 4 cases; Shandong Province 2 cases; Zhejiang Province 2 cases; Liaoning Province 1 case; and Yunnan Province 1 case, including 6 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Guangdong Province 2 cases; Sichuan Province 2 cases; Shandong Province 1 case; and Zhejiang Province 1 case), 131 domestic cases (Shaanxi Province 123 cases; Zhejiang Province 7 cases; and Henan Province 1 case, including 1 case of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed case: Henan Province 1 case), no new deaths, and 1 new suspected case (1 imported case: Shanghai Municipality 1 case).

On this day, 64 patients have recovered and been discharged, 4,803 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition have increased by 1.

Imported cases consist of 822 current cases (3 severe cases) and 1 suspected case. An aggregated 11,199 confirmed cases, 10,377 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, January 01, 2022, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 3,013 confirmed cases (16 severe cases), an accumulated total of 94,856 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 102,505 total confirmed cases, and 1 remaining suspected case. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,427,650 individuals, and 42,965 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 52 new asymptomatic infected persons (48 imported cases and 4 domestic cases: Henan Province 4 cases) were reported, 7 have been changed into confirmed cases (6 imported cases), 9 have been released from medical observation (8 imported cases), and 550 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (519 imported cases).

The NHC has received 29,796 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (12,667 total, 12,209 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 77 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (17,050 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 850 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/a9e94cdd73514d659b8ce8face60705e.shtml

National Health Commission Update on January 01, 2022

From 00:00 to 23:59, December 31, 2021, the National Health Commission (NHC) received confirmed reports from 31 provincial-level administrative divisions (PLADs) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corp (XPCC) of COVID-19, formerly referred to as novel coronavirus pneumonia (NCP). On this day, 231 new cases were confirmed in the mainland of China, including 56 imported cases (Guangdong Province 11 cases; Shanghai Municipality 10 cases; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 9 cases; Tianjin Municipality 9 cases; Fujian Province 4 cases; Hunan Province 4 cases; Beijing Municipality 2 cases; Sichuan Province 2 cases; Yunnan Province 2 cases; Liaoning Province 1 case; Shaanxi Province 1 case; and Shandong Province 1 case, including 10 cases of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed cases: Hunan Province 4 cases; Guangdong Province 3 cases; Sichuan Province 2 cases; and Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 1 case), 175 domestic cases (Shaanxi Province 174 cases and Guizhou Province 1 case, including 1 case of asymptomatic infection that became confirmed case: Guizhou Province 1 case), no new deaths, and 1 new suspected case (1 imported case: Shanghai Municipality 1 case).

On this day, 59 patients have recovered and been discharged, 5,351 have been released from medical observation, and the number of patients in severe condition remained the same with the previous day.

Imported cases consist of 802 current cases (3 severe cases) and 1 suspected case. An aggregated 11,139 confirmed cases, 10,337 who have recovered and been discharged, and 0 deaths have been reported.

On this day, December 31, 2021, the 31 PLADs and XPCC have reported a current total of 2,886 confirmed cases (15 severe cases), an accumulated total of 94,792 patients who have recovered and been discharged, 4,636 total deaths, 102,314 total confirmed cases, and 1 remaining suspected case. Medical contact tracing has followed-up with 1,423,756 individuals, and 43,874 are still under medical isolation.

On this day, 38 new asymptomatic infected persons (33 imported cases and 5 domestic cases: Henan Province 4 cases and Guangdong Province 1 case) were reported, 11 have been changed into confirmed cases (10 imported cases), 25 have been released from medical observation (22 imported cases), and 514 asymptomatic infected persons are still under medical observation (485 imported cases).

The NHC has received 29,757 confirmed reports from Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, China (12,649 total, 12,206 patients have been discharged, and 213 deaths); Macau Special Administrative Region, China (79 total and 77 patients have been discharged); and Taiwan, China (17,029 total, 13,742 patients have been discharged, and 850 deaths).

Source:  http://www.nhc.gov.cn/xcs/yqtb/202201/64fae96558284e548f31f67bb541b8f2.shtml
